channel.title: Lots of Problems

item.title: Lots of Problems
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

You commands arent working because you either added them in the wrong spot or you didnt compileâ€¦Bank crashes because you messed around with the item IDS adding silab items my guess?..You cant interact with the shopkeeper because you either didnt compile or you didnt add the wanneshop right.

Please note that if you add anything else while your compiler has an error it wont check anything else it will just show the error that it had in the first place and your new updates Wont work.

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of Problems
item.dc:creator: @Songie Songie
item.description:
@Songie wrote:

3 seperate problems.

Firstly:
-None of my commands work any more. An example:

	if (command.startsWith("rangegear"))
	{
		addItem(2581, 1);
		addItem(4736, 1);
		addItem(4738, 1);
		addItem(4214, 1);
		addItem(2577, 1);
		addItem(6585, 1);
		addItem(1052, 1);
		sendMessage("Train Ranging at ::range!");
	
	}

-Secondly:
My bank crashes me every time i try to use it.

-Finally:
I cant interact with my shopkeeper I made.

Can someone help with anything? :mad: :mad:

Read full topic
